name: py-poetry

description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependencies.name: py-backports-cached-property
dependencies.description: cached_property() - computed once per instance, cached as attribute

dependencies.name: py-build
dependencies.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.

dependencies.name: py-cachecontrol
dependencies.description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.

dependencies.name: py-cachy
dependencies.description: Cachy provides a simple yet effective caching library.

dependencies.name: py-cleo
dependencies.description:
Cleo allows you to create beautiful and testable command-line
interfaces.

dependencies.name: py-clikit
dependencies.description:
CliKit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command
line interfaces.

dependencies.name: py-crashtest
dependencies.description:
Crashtest is a Python library that makes exceptions handling and
inspection easier.

dependencies.name: py-dulwich
dependencies.description:
Dulwich aims to provide an interface to Git repos (both local and
remote) that doesn't call out to Git directory, but instead uses pure
Python.

dependencies.name: py-html5lib
dependencies.description: HTML parser based on the WHATWG HTML specification.

dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-installer
dependencies.description: A library for installing Python wheels.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-keyring
dependencies.description:
The Python keyring library provides an easy way to access the system
keyring service from python. It can be used in any application that
needs safe password storage.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pexpect
dependencies.description: Pexpect allows easy control of interactive console applications.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pkginfo
dependencies.description: Query metadatdata from sdists / bdists / installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-platformdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir"

dependencies.name: py-poetry-core
dependencies.description: Poetry PEP 517 Build Backend.

dependencies.name: py-poetry-plugin-export
dependencies.description: Poetry plugin to export the dependencies to various formats

dependencies.name: py-pyproject-hooks
dependencies.description: Wrappers to call pyproject.toml-based build backend hooks.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-requests-toolbelt
dependencies.description:
A toolbelt of useful classes and functions to be used with python-
requests

dependencies.name: py-shellingham
dependencies.description: Tool to Detect Surrounding Shell

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-tomlkit
dependencies.description: Style preserving TOML library

dependencies.name: py-trove-classifiers
dependencies.description:
The trove-classifiers pacakge is the canonical source for classifiers on
PyPI. Classifiers categorize projects per PEP 301.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-virtualenv
dependencies.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.description:
A python interface to access extended file attributes, sans libattr
dependency.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-graphlib-backport
dependent_to.description: Backport of the Python 3.9 graphlib module for Python 3.6+.

dependent_to.name: py-clean-text
dependent_to.description:
User-generated content on the Web and in social media is often dirty.
Preprocess your scraped data with clean-text to create a normalized text
representation.

dependent_to.name: py-questionary
dependent_to.description:
Questionary is a Python library for effortlessly building pretty command
line interfaces.

dependent_to.name: py-flatten-dict
dependent_to.description:
A flexible utility for flattening and unflattening dict-lik objects in
Python

dependent_to.name: py-poetry-plugin-tweak-dependencies-version
dependent_to.description: Poetry plugin used to tweak dependency versions.

dependent_to.name: py-stomp-py
dependent_to.description:
Python client library for accessing messaging servers (such as ActiveMQ,
Artemis or RabbitMQ) using the STOMP protocol (STOMP v1.0, STOMP v1.1
and STOMP v1.2)

dependent_to.name: py-graphql-core
dependent_to.description:
GraphQL-core 3 is a Python 3.6+ port of GraphQL.js, the JavaScript
reference implementation for GraphQL, a query language for APIs created
by Facebook.
